p.s: The exerptexcerpt from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018 is about Chris trying to excuse himself with playing a selfmade beat to Starr.
The given sequence is placed after Starr and Chris had a conflict about Chris having a condom with him, although Starr doesn't want to sleep with him yet.
Chris is walking down the hallway in school and greeting all his friends.
After noticing Starr, who watches him, he walks up to her but she turns away.
Then Chris puts his headphones on Starr and plays a self-made beat.
Starr blocks him again and they both talk about their conflict and their relationship.
After that, Chris tries to convince Starr that she likes his beat by dancing to it in the hallway infrontin front of the other students.
Starr laughs and they both walk away.
